prompt: Which planet has the largest number of known moons?
input:
Which planet has the largest number of known moons?

Options:
A. Earth
B. Jupiter
C. Mars
D. Venus

Return ONLY one final line in the exact format:
Answer: <A|B|C|D|YES|NO|integer>
Do not include explanations or extra text. If options are labeled A-D, answer with the letter only.

prompt: Which pipeline prints only running systemd service unit names, one per line?
input:
Which pipeline prints only running systemd service unit names, one per line?

Options:
A. systemctl list-units --type=service --state=running --no-legend --plain | awk '{printf "%s\n", $1}'
B. systemctl status --running --no-pager | awk '{print $1}'
C. systemctl list-unit-files --state=enabled --no-legend | awk '{print $1}'
D. systemctl list-units --type=service --all --no-legend | awk '{print $1}'

Return ONLY one final line in the exact format:
Answer: <A|B|C|D|YES|NO|integer>
Do not include explanations or extra text. If options are labeled A-D, answer with the letter only.

prompt: Which Git command lists untracked files only (respecting .gitignore)?
input:
Which Git command lists untracked files only (respecting .gitignore)?

Options:
A. git status -s
B. git diff --name-only
C. git ls-files --others --exclude-standard
D. git ls-files --deleted

Return ONLY one final line in the exact format:
Answer: <A|B|C|D|YES|NO|integer>
Do not include explanations or extra text. If options are labeled A-D, answer with the letter only.
